    • classes.Reservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a reservation made by a customer

    2016-10-25
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    wang_xingyue

      • Reservation

        public Reservation(java.lang.String customerName,
                   int customerContact,
                   int numPax,
                   java.util.Calendar arrivalTime,
                   classes.Table reserveTable)
        create a new reservation having a customer name, customer contact number, number of expected people, expected arrival time, and reserved table
        Parameters:
        customerName - Name of customer who made the reservation
        customerContact - Contact number of customer
        numPax - Number of expected people for this reservation
        arrivalTime - Time customer is expected to arrive
        reserveTable - Table reserved for this reservation
